ygData.subject: Re: multiple casting of tashan
ygData.msgSnippet: Multiple Tashan dont stack up. try it on yourself an see. No spell in the game that I know of stacks up with itself except the necro dots spells if casted from
ygData.messageBody:
Multiple Tashan dont stack up. try it on yourself an see. No spell in the
game that I know of stacks up with itself except the necro dots spells if
casted from multiple necros.
Skara

-----Original Message-----
From: Tim Borelli [mailto:timb@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 12:27 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] multiple casting of tashan


From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>

not sure about tashan, but you cannot stack choke spells. it'll just do the
20dmg again and start the DoT over.

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 20th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

>
>Which brings me to my question. Can you cast tashan multiple times on a
mob and have it be additive? I tried it with a yellow orc, and was able to
charm him. Boy that was cool. Im just not sure if I'm wasting mana or if
hitting a guy twice with tashan is really helpful?
>
>
>The same question can be applied to choke. Will 2 castings on the same
mob by the same person cause twice the damage? Or does a second casting
just start the damage over again?
>

-------------------
tim borrelli
computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
Volition, Inc.
